pubspec.name: lints
pubspec.description: Official Dart lint rules. Defines the 'core' and 'recommended' set of lints suggested by the Dart team.

sections.title: Follow Dart file conventions
sections.summary:
### [x] 0/10 points: Provide a valid `pubspec.yaml`

* `pubspec.yaml` doesn't have a `homepage` entry.
* `pubspec.yaml` doesn't have a `repository` entry.

### [*] 5/5 points: Provide a valid `README.md`


### [*] 5/5 points: Provide a valid `CHANGELOG.md`


### [*] 10/10 points: Use an OSI-approved license

Detected license: `BSD-3-Clause`.

sections.title: Provide documentation
sections.summary:
### [x] 0/10 points: Package has an example

<details>
<summary>
No example found.
</summary>

See [package layout](https://dart.dev/tools/pub/package-layout#examples) guidelines on how to add an example.
</details>

sections.title: Platform support
sections.summary:
### [*] 20/20 points: Supports 6 of 6 possible platforms (**iOS**, **Android**, **Web**, **Windows**, **macOS**, **Linux**)

* ✓ Android
* ✓ iOS
* ✓ Windows
* ✓ Linux
* ✓ macOS
* ✓ Web

### [*] 0/0 points: WASM readiness

Package is compatible with runtime `wasm`.

sections.title: Pass static analysis
sections.summary: ### [*] 50/50 points: code has no errors, warnings, lints, or formatting issues

sections.title: Support up-to-date dependencies
sections.summary:
### [*] 10/10 points: All of the package dependencies are supported in the latest version

No dependencies.

To reproduce run `dart pub outdated --no-dev-dependencies --up-to-date --no-dependency-overrides`.


### [*] 10/10 points: Package supports latest stable Dart and Flutter SDKs


### [*] 20/20 points: Compatible with dependency constraint lower bounds

`pub downgrade` does not expose any static analysis error.
